text: John Giles Whitbourn (1885 – 1936) was an English professional footballer who played as a goalkeeper for Sunderland. ==References== Category:1885 births Category:1936 deaths Category:People from Farnham Category:English footballers Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:South Bank F.C. players Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:Tottenham Hotspur F.C. players Category:Leyton F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: John Whitbourn (footballer)
